site.title: Skilled Trade Manpower
site.description: Utah-based staffing and recruiting agency for construction, healthcare, and technology.

hero.title: Connecting Skilled Talent with Top Employers
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for staffing solutions in Utah. We specialize in Construction, Healthcare, Technology, and General Labor.

recruiting.title: Employment Recruiting
recruiting.desc: Full-cycle recruiting to find the perfect match for your company culture and needs.

skilledTrades.title: Skilled Trades Staffing
skilledTrades.desc: Qualified tradespeople ready to hit the ground running on your projects.

construction.title: Construction Labor
construction.desc: Reliable general and skilled labor for construction sites of all sizes.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Staffing
healthcare.desc: Certified professionals for hospitals, clinics, and care facilities.

technology.title: Technology Staffing
technology.desc: Developers, engineers, and IT specialists for the digital age.

generalLabor.title: General Labor
generalLabor.desc: Flexible workforce for warehousing, manufacturing, and logistics.

sales.title: Sales Teams

socialMedia.title: Social Media Recruiting
